meanings.definition: A type of bird with a long, thin beak and a distinctive crown of feathers.
meanings.sent1: The hoopoes chirped melodiously in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of hoopoes perched on the tree branches.
meanings.sent3: The hoopoes decided to have a feather-styling competition.
meanings.sent4: The hoopoes' crown of feathers shimmered in the sunlight like a royal headdress.
meanings.sent5: As the hoopoes flew overhead, their distinctive beaks caught my eye.
